app_descript:
Foody Savior

Brief: Foody Savior is the ultimate app for food enthusiasts who are also conscious about food waste and supporting local businesses. This innovative app leverages geolocation technology to connect you with local merchants, allowing you to order surprise baskets of excess inventory at a reduced price, thereby contributing to a sustainable environment.

Core Features:

  • ğŸ“ Local Merchant Discovery: Locate nearby participating stores easily with the built-in geolocation feature. ğŸŒ
  • ğŸ›’ Diverse Filter Options: Tailor your search to meet your dietary preferences, such as bakeries, grocery stores, vegan options, and more. ğŸ¥–
  • ğŸ Surprise Baskets: Experience the joy of surprise with each purchase, as merchants offer unique baskets that help save delicious products from going to waste. ğŸ
  • ğŸ”” Real-Time Notifications: Stay updated with the live notification system that informs you when your order is ready for pickup. ğŸ“²
  • ğŸŒ Sustainability Contribution: Every order you make contributes to reducing food waste and preserving the planet's resources. ğŸŒ±
